channel.title: Android Design
channel.description:
Google released a website recently dubbed "Android Design" which gives tips and suggestions for how you should design your mobile application. While it articulates specifically towards the mobile operating system, there are certain parts that really give a sense of how a [b]website[/b] should be designed too, to a certain degree. It's probably the best in-depth website on user interface and design I've ever read in my life. Definitely worth looking over. I've bookmarked it myself.
http://developer.android.com/design/index.html
